name: Eric and Luna - The Dungeon Duo
name_original: Eric and Luna - The Dungeon Duo
description:
Never fight alone!

It's a classic Top Down Adventure Game based on Combat, but you have 2 playable Characters.

This game should support Controlers aswell (Stick to move, right shoulder button (RB) to switch, west button (x on xbox controlers))

Controls:

W,A,S,D to run around

SPACE to attack the blue enemies

After you found Luna, use SHIFT to switch between the Knight Eric (Red) and the Witch Luna (purple). You control only one at a time, the other one follows. Only the controled Character can take damage, by touching the Slimes.

Luna's fireballs (range combat) only attacks the dark blue Slimes.

Eric can attack everything, his passive ability (when he isn't thr controled one) protects you from enemy projectiles... There are no projectiles in this version... so it is practicly useless.. (But switch sometomes, because they don't share a health pool)

Bonus tip: Play slow, you shouldn't attack all enemies at once.

Have Fun!
